thread.title: Man shot by police in Paris after attacking pedestrians with a knife

author: Bertrand Guay
title: Man shot by police in Paris after attacking pedestrians with a knife

organizations.name: published updated moments ago reuters bertrand guay

text:
Science Man shot by police in Paris after attacking pedestrians with a knife A man attacked bystanders with a knife in the heart of Paris on Saturday before being shot by police, BFM TV said. A police source confirmed there had been a knife attack without giving any details. Published 12 Mins Ago Reuters Bertrand Guay | AFP | Getty Images Policemen stand near a vehicle on the place du Trocadero in Paris on April 21, 2017.
An assailant armed with a knife killed at least one person and inuured several more in Paris in an attack on Saturday night before being shot dead by police, a police source said.
Four people were injured, including two seriously, BFM TV said.
A police source confirmed there had been a knife attack without giving any details. One police source told NBC News that the attacker was overheard shouting "Allahu Akbar", Arabic for "Allah is the Greatest."
--CNBC contributed to this report.
